column4: hi all, im trying to get into the yahoo.com chat, using ubuntu fiesty fawn. im getting An external application must be launched to handle ymsgr:links. requested link:  ymsgr:chat? Application: purple-url-handler "%s" when i click on launch application nothing happens. any ideas anyone?
have you tried Pidgen or GAIM?
seemed to me like you clicked on a link in a browser
sorry, can't help you anymore, I never use Yahoo chat
